text.section:
This section does not apply to a physician or group of physicians who:
Have exclusive contracts with a health maintenance organization;
Treat only the patients of the health maintenance organization; and
Agree to accept full assignment for covered services rendered.

If a physician is engaged in the private practice of medicine in this State, the physician shall display a notice written in English that is plainly visible to patients in the office of the physician concerning whether the physician:
Is a participating physician under the Medicare program and, therefore, accepts assignment for all Medicare claims;
Accepts Medicare assignment on a case-by-case basis; or
Does not accept Medicare assignment in any case.
